title: Couldn't Remake When Someone Was Obviously afk
body: Just had a game where someone was obviously afk but could not remake the game.  We couldn't even start the vote process. The game even said when he reconnected.

replies.body:
TimeThief I've missed you! 

What he said covered most of it how remakes work. Keep in mind that First Blood against the afk'ers team before they left will also prevent the /remake from starting. Check out the rest of the [**remake requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) to be sure of when it's possible.
he has to be dced for 90 consecutive seconds before the 3 minute mark. if he tryed to reconnect it probably wasnt 90 seconds so you couldnt remake.
